live_updates: Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution. Thank you for your patience.
Our technicians have been able to stabilize services for majority of the impacted customers. Work will be continued tomorrow to finish the repairs. We appreciate your continued patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
57339.summary: Some customers in Dewdney are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
57339.title: Jan 26 - Dewdney | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates. A further update will be provided at 12:11 pm.
57358.summary: Some customers in the Terwillegar South area of Edmonton are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
57358.title: Jan 27 - Edmonton (Terwillegar South) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: Our teams have resolved the issue. Thank you for your patience!
Our technicians continue the final repairs to services through the night. We apologize for the extended disruption.
Power has been restored, and services are back online for most customers. Technicians continue to restore services for a few remaining areas.
Small update to region impacted as Hydro crews continue their work and some of our customers come back online automatically.

Teams have confirmed a power outage is present in the area affecting our equipment. Please refer to your local power company for any updates. Once power is restored, services in the area should begin working. Our next update will be after the power is restored.
57330.summary: Jingle Pot & East Wellington areas of Nanaimo, and some surrounding areas, are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
57330.title: Jan 26 - Nanaimo (Jingle Pot & East Wellington) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
